website_summaries.verdict: Electric juicers don't get much more affordable than the Black & Decker JE2400BD Juice Extractor, but despite its small stature and price tag it processes citrus and other fruit well.
pros: The Black & Decker JE2400BD Juice Extractor is very inexpensive yet out-juices machines which cost multiple times more
The appliance is also compact and uses parts which are dishwasher-friendly
cons: While small in size the Black & Decker JE2400BD Juice Extractor uses an food chute with a tiny mouth so you'll have to chop your produce before juicing
The machine lacks it own juice container to collect processed liquid

customer_reviews.title: Wasteful
customer_reviews.text: Huge amount of food wasted - I'm talking chunks of apple and kiwi that had not been juiced. Had to run the "waste" through the machine multiple times in order to actually extract all juice.
customer_reviews.author: S. Patton

customer_reviews.title: Great Product with a Small Price but even Smaller Mouth
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is the essence of what a good compact juicer should be. It does not take up too much space in between my toaster and my blender and it worked just fine straight out of the box (after a good cleaning with warm water and soap of course). The only gripe I've had with this juicer is that the mouth is significantly smaller than other compact juicers I have seen. If you choose to buy this product I would advise the buyer to acknowledge that they will have to prepare their fruits and vegetables but chopping them up into smaller pieces before being able to feed them through this particular juicer.
customer_reviews.author: Serg

customer_reviews.title: For the $40 price point this is a good juicer. If you are just starting out in ...
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned a juicer before, read the reviews before I bought this one. For the $40 price point this is a good juicer. If you are just starting out in juicing, I think this is a good entry machine. If we stay with the juicing, I will upgrade to a more powerful juicer, but this one does this trick just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michele O

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price. But juice has a lot of foam and needs to constantly be mixed.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and serves its purpose. But the juice always have more pulp than I would like and separates like you can see in the image. The top blade is also sometimes difficult to remove to clean. But overall good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Received this juicer yesterday and was super excited to try it out
customer_reviews.text: Received this juicer yesterday and was super excited to try it out. This is my first time owning a juicer. Not hard to assemble and dessemble. The mouth is quite small so you do have to cut the fruits into smaller pieces. But the machine does its job. I heard before that you'll know if you got a good juicer when you look at the pulp. I juiced pineapple and an orange but the pulp was not all dry, it still was quite wet so I pour the pulp out into a cheesecloth and squeezed the extra juice out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny chute, can't do anything light
customer_reviews.text: Stupid tiny chute requires cutting up most fruits and veg. Works okay as long as you are not trying to juice greens like kale or spinach. If you do this, expect that almost all of the vegetable matter will shoot into the pulp bin, filling it immediately and/or clogging the unit and covering the motor piece with juice (impossible to clean if this happens). Stick to substantial fruits and vegetables with this model (non-leafy) and you're ok.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Kane

customer_reviews.title: Okay if you only juice once or twice a week
customer_reviews.text: Product is okay, my first juicer but right away I noticed that ALOT and I mean ALOT of moisture and juice gets lost in the pulp compartment. i would say about 25-30% of your juice is wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Like it so far, very compact and easy to use and clean. Works quite well for everything I've tried so far. I only wish the feeding inlet was a bit larger, need to cut everything in quite small pieces. That's my only issue, else would have given 5stars
customer_reviews.author: DEBASMITA BASAK

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience possibly good product
customer_reviews.text: The one i received came with a dead motor i cant return it because i dont have a printer and its been over a month since i purchased it smh
customer_reviews.author: eduardo

customer_reviews.title: This is a TERRIBLE model!
customer_reviews.text: This is far smaller than my last Black & Decker Juicer. The vegetables or fruit have to be cut into small pieces, which was not necessary on previous model. The glass has to sit at an angle under the spout, making it unstable. After one glass of juice, I had green splashes all over the counter and backsplash. This is a TERRIBLE model!
customer_reviews.author: Denise C Abrams

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ITEM
customer_reviews.text: OMG I WAS SO EXCITED AT THE PRICE & THAN WHEN I RECIEVED IT IT WAS PERFECT I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: TeamDavis2018

customer_reviews.title: Half of the fruit gets wasted in pulp section
customer_reviews.text: Half of the fruit gets wasted in pulp section. The mouth is so narrow, u need to cut the fruit into veryyy small pieces. Lot of work to do.
customer_reviews.author: tahir

customer_reviews.title: For the price it does an okay job
customer_reviews.text: It definitely won't juice like a $250 machine, but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Reekie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This one really good to me, I like this Juicer so much

customer_reviews.title: I guess you get what you pay for but I would advise an upgrade as the juice comes out super foamy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not very impressed with this, I guess you get what you pay for but I would advise an upgrade as the juice comes out super foamy.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Juicer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, just messy. Too many parts to clean. A blender is just as easy But then again this is a cheap juicer. Get what you pay for. But it works.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Douthit - Amazon I still haven't received my mask. I order them back in April.

customer_reviews.title: The hole is too small to put fruits and veggies ...
customer_reviews.text: The hole is too small to put fruits and veggies..this will make you mess all over if u going to juice kale with this juicer you have to wrap with other fruits or else mess everywhre..loud but it works ok..

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, but not goid for small items
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a juicer before, so it may not be just this machine. Is good for hard/course textured items, but just slings soft or small texture items to pulp bin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The first time it worked fine but I got stuck with my carrots since it ...
customer_reviews.text: Today was the second time that I attempted using the juice extractor and it didn't want to turn on. The first time it worked fine but I got stuck with my carrots since it doesn't turn on. I need you to do something in regards since I don't even have 8 months since I bought it.

customer_reviews.title: most notably multiple speeds so you get a lot of waste on softer fruits
customer_reviews.text: Low price, and it works. Doesn't have some of the features of higher end models, most notably multiple speeds so you get a lot of waste on softer fruits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean and work, enough to make about three 8 oz. glasses of juice.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but could use a little bit more power

customer_reviews.title: cleaned up easily and never balked at whatever was small enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: opening was small. expected that. cleaned up easily and never balked at whatever was small enough to get loaded into the chute. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: This is okay for the money. It's loud and, as others have said, the chute is a bit tiny. I have noticed leakage from one side of the top cover (I think someone else noticed this also). On the plus side, it is compact and overall it does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great addition to ou lives. It makes delicious juice and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: USELESS
customer_reviews.text: Doesnot work ,stops every second of the juicing process.DO NOT BUY.USELESS APPLIANCE

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had known about this easy to use and inexpensive juicer YEARS ago before wasting ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had known about this easy to use and inexpensive juicer YEARS ago before wasting HUNDREDS on other 'Top Brands' that, after a few months, stopped working. This actually also juices wheatgrass. Seriously, people, this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Waters

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Noisy, Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: This is my first juicer. Does not get as much juice from the produce as I would have hoped. The remnants in the dispenser are very wet, however it does produce a decent amount of juice. From one grapefruit, I got about a cup of juice. Definitely removes all of the pulp. Easy to clean and reassemble. It's pretty noisy - my neighbor upstairs can tell when I'm juicing.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Catizone

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: This works ok-lots of juice still in the pulp however. Also, messy and hard to clean. Probably wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bojorquez

customer_reviews.title: Ok appliance opening too small
customer_reviews.text: Man the opening where u put the fruits n vegis is hella small my first appliance like this so i didnt know its ok i will not buy again tho my opion tho does the job just gotta put extra work wen juicing with fruits and veggies
customer_reviews.author: babygirl

customer_reviews.title: This juicer is easy to use and is ok for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is easy to use and is ok for beginners. You do have to cut everything into small chunks to juice, which I knew before ordering. I feel as though this machine is not easy to keep clean. I cant just wash it out and reuse it. I have to scrub the strainer basket after each use. It also leaks a little (about the size of a quarter) of juice underneath the machine when in use.
customer_reviews.author: te2077

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! Very easy to use and to clean. I can't think of a better quality for this price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Denys Thomson

customer_reviews.title: price equals quality
customer_reviews.text: since it spins so fast, there is far less extraction of juices (learned it the hard way). purchased a more expensive, slow speed juicer.
customer_reviews.author: nanook

customer_reviews.title: ... nearly every day for about two months now and love it, only takes a few minutes to clean ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this juicer nearly every day for about two months now and love it, only takes a few minutes to clean as long as you rinse it off within a few minutes of use. Does a pretty good job for being so inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: AlphaGhost

customer_reviews.title: You want this juicer
customer_reviews.text: Masicates well, and the pulp is dry. Nice safety features easy clean up if you do it quickly waiting can make it hard. Downside is juice is very frothy Now you do have to cut up the fruit to fit, but that is so minor when you consider the price and dry pulp
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this juicer and within 2 weeks of my ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this juicer and within 2 weeks of my husband using it daily, the inside of part that turns the blade had melted. Returned for a refund, thankfully.
customer_reviews.author: Katied123

customer_reviews.title: It is a great starter juicer
customer_reviews.text: It is a great starter juicer! You need to cut the pieces small to fit the feeder, so it probably takes longer to make juice than other juicers. Considering it is a lower priced juicer it works out.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one good juicer. Delivered quickly. We did several gallons of blackberries and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: christianconservative

customer_reviews.title: The fruit shoot is made to juice
customer_reviews.text: This should be for a kid because the fruit chute is so small you have to cut the fruit into small pieces in order to fit and it does not juice well because the fruit peelings were very saturated with juice and not in my cup.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this unit does it's job pretty well. have been juicing every day. thanks.
customer_reviews.author: ms. melen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful machine. Very Powerful and easy to clean the ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful machine. Very Powerful and easy to clean the opening is small so you just chop up your vegetables works great even on kale and spinach very compact

customer_reviews.title: works.
customer_reviews.text: works. but you have to cut fruit to put it in

customer_reviews.title: You have to cut your produce into small enough pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: You have to cut your produce into small enough pieces to fit into the especially small opening. So it takes longer to juice than I was used to, but the machine overall works well!

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: One of the sides leak when I use it.. Easy clean up. Small feeder so the fruit and veggies have to be smaller, but that's fine

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!!!! Changed my life and works perfectly. I've been telling all my friends and family to get one for only forty bucks, what a deal for us beginner juicers.

customer_reviews.title: It licks
customer_reviews.text: I love the compact part of it, but the performance is not good, the juices licks from the sides and makes a total mess ,not happy about that. not a high performance for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Rona F.

customer_reviews.title: ... of plastic seems cheap but the machine works really great extract every drop of

customer_reviews.text: Does well with vegetables and more solid fruits. Overall satisfied for a starter juicer.

customer_reviews.title: I wasted 37$ on this juicer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this juicer about 2 months ago. During this period, I used this just 4 or 5 times. The juicer stopped working. I wasted 37$ on this juicer.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.title: Good for a starter juicer
customer_reviews.text: There's a slight leak in the right side. When I place the top clear piece on the juicer doesnt fit properly untill I lock it in. That could be the reason theres a small leak.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it. Good size. And inexpensive for the inexperienced juicer like myself.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Big machine, small input
customer_reviews.text: Everything works fine but the small chute should be larger to hold more veggies

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Broke the day I got it. I guess you get what you pay for. Really disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Not for leafy greens
customer_reviews.text: Not good for juicing leafy greens such as kale. I got 2oz of juice out of a large bunch of kale from whole foods. it juices juicy fruits well like oranges. Even carrots is fine. But you stick kale through it and it just chops it up, nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: California Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: You have to cut in very tiny pieces all de fruit and vegetables, it was very frustrating.

customer_reviews.title: Good as promised
customer_reviews.text: Love it, been using it for a month and still working good.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the fruit and or vegetables you use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to improve my juicing. Thought I would try a Lime but, apparently that was a no-go. The lime juice was so bitter, it was just awful. Returned the item promptly. If your fruit has a bitter component to it, this juicer isn't for you. Trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony O.

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER 400-Watt Fruit and Vegetable Juice Extractor, Black, JE2400BD
product_meta.description: The BLACK+DECKER 400-Watt Juice Extractor makes it easy to turn all your favorite fruits and vegetables into delicious, pulp-free juice. The powerful 400-watt motor quickly works through produce, separating fresh juice from the pulp, which is collected in a separate container. With intuitive controls and dishwasher-safe parts, it’s the fast and easy way to enjoy fresh, flavorful juice!
feature_bullets: 400-Watt Motor - Extract fresh, pulp-free juice in just seconds! The intuitive on/off switch provides the best performance for all kinds of fruit and vegetables
Compact Design - The vertically-oriented juice extractor saves space on the countertop
Stainless Steel Cutter and Strainer - The durable cutter quickly works through fruits and vegetables, and it’s easy to clean and reuse
Dishwasher-Safe Parts - Every removable part is safe to clean in the dishwasher, further simplifying the juice-making process
Fruit and Vegetable Pusher - The pusher guides fresh produce towards the cutters for maximum juice extraction

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars211 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
